pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, November 10, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Lille, France

7:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Lille.

Pavillon d’Honneur
Lille-Lesquin Airport

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage

Vimy, France

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Seamus O’Regan will attend a commemorative ceremony of remembrance, and deliver remarks.

Canadian Cemetery Number 2
Givenchy Road

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage

9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Seamus O’Regan will meet with the Vimy Memorial Canadian student tour guides.

Closed to media.

9:55 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Seamus O’Regan will tour the Vimy Foundation Centennial Park.

Vimy Foundation Centennial Park

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Seamus O’Regan will participate in a wreath laying ceremony.

Canadian National Vimy Memorial

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

10:35 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Seamus O’Regan will attend a reception with Canadian Armed Forces Veterans.

Maison Allward
Canadian National Vimy Memorial

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage at the beginning of the reception

Paris, France

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Picasso Blue and Rose exhibition.

Musée d’Orsay
1 rue de la Légion d’Honneur

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a leader’s reception hosted by President of the French Republic Emmanuel Macron.

Closed to media.

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a leader’s dinner hosted by President of the French Republic Emmanuel Macron.

Closed to media.
